name: JuggerKrab
description:
This game was created for Kaiju Jam 2: https://itch.io/jam/kaijujam2

It was made using RPG Developer Bakin engine, focusing on the optional theme "Crustacean".

You play as a young wizard named Luke. He lives in a world where monsters roam everywhere. Some are friendly and intelligent. Others are wild and dangerous.

Combat is inspired by the Megaman Battle Network series. As of now it is pretty basic. I will continue working on this battle system on other projects, and I might come back to this one and make significative improvements.

Basic Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys, W A S D

Run - Hold Shift

Interact / Shoot (Combat) - Z, Enter, Space Bar, 

Cancel, Jump - X

Controller

Any feedback will be greatly appreciated! ^_^
